name: Darkland: The Lost Realm
overview: A collect-em-up style action game that appears to have been created in Italy. Experience a strange world where movements can be measured in leaps and bounds and where the hero moves and defends himself from attacks, throwing a very elastic ball that has the power to take down opponents. The attack is triggered by the appearance of a continuous series of armed devils coming down from the sky, which seems like the wrong direction. You start with 9 lives but you'll be needing all of them as this is a very high level of difficulty. Every life lost can turn off the lights, so I hope you remember your way around. Each area you open gets you a step closer to the final victory. Published under several names by multiple Italian publishers, including Videoteca Computer n.13 where it was named Dark Space.
